text: Tanımadığım, bilmediğim bir ihtiyar artık o.

text: Gündoğdu abim Noyan'ı obaya getirmekle hata etti.
english: My brother Gündoğdu made a mistake bringing Noyan to the tribe.

text: Eğer sen baş alp olsaydın onu değil kellesini getirirdin.
english: If you were the chief warrior, you would n't bring him back, you'd bring back his head.
Everything in its time, my lord.

text: Sen ne dersin kardeşim? Sana, ailene ettiklerini bilmez misin?
english: What do you say, brother? Don't you know what he did to you and your family?
And what about what they did to Ertuğrul?

text: Elbet bilirim ağabey. Lakin devletin de bizim gibi yaralarını sarması şarttır.
english: Of course I know, brother. But it is essential that the state, like us, heals its wounds.
This peace will strengthen our state.
What peace are you talking about, brother?

text: Moğolların sulh falan istediği yok. Görmez misin?
english: The Mongols don't want peace at all. Ca n't you see?

text: Tekrar saldıracaklar. Daha da güçlenip saldıracaklar.

text: Ağabey, ne Moğollar sulh ister ne de biz bu Moğol belasından kurtulabiliriz.
english: Brother, neither do the Mongols want peace, nor can we ever escape this Mongol menace. Believe me,

text: Emin ol bu gerçeği göremeyecek kadar kör değilim.

text: Hakikati bilirim, lakin öfkeme esir olmayacak kadar tedbirliyim.
english: I know the truth, but I am cautious enough not to be consumed by anger.

text: Ertuğrul Bey'im olsaydı dünya yıkılsa o iti sağ koymazdı.
english: If Ertuğrul Bey were alive, even if the world collapsed, he wouldn't leave that dog alive.

text: Bu otağın gölgesinde yaşayan kim varsa...

...knows that Noyan will not stop killing.

text: Halime'nin karnındaki bebesini bile bilir o soysuz.

text: Onun o hayasız, uğursuz, arsız sürüsü de...

english: They know how much we love and respect each other... but they lie in ambush for us

text: Bize düşen, otlar gibi ezilip gitmemektir.

text: …bilin ki bizlerin de, devletimizin de daim kalması içindir.
english: …know that it is for the sake of our own survival and the survival of our state . That is

text: …öfkemize yenik düşmeden, devletimizin emrine uymak mecburiyetindeyiz.
english: … we are obliged to obey the orders of our state without succumbing to our anger. It is our duty to stand by
our state, which we supported in war, in

text: …sulhta da yanında yer almak, boynumuzun borcudur.

english: In my opinion, the time has come to
get the gentlemen's opinions on how to resolve this matter .

text: Gerçi kıldan ince, kılıçtan keskince bu yolda…
english: Although this path is as delicate as a hair and as sharp as a sword…
…we will raise our hands in despair… But
From what I can see, our gentlemen…
…or the ravens feast on the carcass.
my hand had been broken so I wouldn't have lifted it.
The raven has already descended upon the carcass.

text: Bundan böyle beni bu toyda kimse beklemesin.
english: From now on, nobody should expect me at this wedding .
(Bird chirping sounds) Peace be upon you
and the mercy of Allah. Peace be
upon you and the mercy of Allah.

text: Ey göklerin ve yerin nuru olan Allah’ım.
english: O Allah, the light of the heavens and the earth .
You are the judge. You are capable. In
all our helplessness, we seek refuge in You.

text: Senden yardım diler, senden merhamet bekleriz.
english: We seek your help, we expect your mercy.
Oh God, the state of Islam is deplorable.

text: Fitne, nifak tüm kalpleri esir almıştır.
english: Discord and strife have taken hold of all hearts.
We have become partners with the oppressors.
our hearts with the light of faith.
O Lord, increase our sincerity. Let

text: Küfre karşı, zalime karşı bizi bir eyle…
english: Against blasphemy, against injustice, unite us...
make us strong, make us vigilant.

text: Yarabbi, bize Hazreti Muhammet’in ümmeti olma şerefini verdin.
english: O Lord, You have granted us the honor of being part of the Ummah of Prophet Muhammad. May God grant us the grace to

text: Bu uğurda şehit olmayı da nasip eyle.
english: become martyrs in this cause . Don't
turn us away from your path.
Do not leave us without your mercy.
In the name of the Everlasting…
I bear witness that there is no…
I bear witness that there is no.
I bear witness that there is no god but Allah

text: …ve eşhedü enne Muhammeden abdûhü ve resûlühu.
english: … and I bear witness that Muhammad is His servant and messenger.

text: Allah senden de, oğlundan da razı olsun.
english: God be pleased with you and your son . -You've

text: Yine geleceksiniz değil mi Ertuğrul Bey’im?
english: You will come again, won't you, Mr. Ertuğrul? I

text: İnşallah en yakın zamanda geleceğim Edebali.
(Hep bir ağızdan) Eyvallah. Yolun açık olsun.
english: (All together) Thank you. Have a safe journey. Let's begin in the name of God
Let's reach our camp quickly, Alps! Goo

text: Emir Hazretleri, otağımıza kadar giren bu kefereyi kendi ellerimizle size veririz.
english: Your Highness, we will hand over these infidels who have entered our tent to you with our own hands.

text: Lakin kardeşlerimden, otağımdan, obamdan birine bir hâl gelirse…
english: But if any harm befalls one of my brothers, one of my tribe, or one of my clans… the
responsibility will be on your shoulders. Just so you know.

text: Gündoğdu Bey’im, sen de çok iyi bilirsin ki…
english: Mr. Gündoğdu, as you well know...
our state never forgets those who serve it.

text: Hele Kayıları, hiçbir zaman mağdur etmez.
english: Especially the Kayı tribe, they never let them down.

text: Esire böyle muamele etmek de ne demek?
english: What does it mean to treat a prisoner like that? Would something like this be fitting for the

text: Dodurgaların gelecekteki beyine böyle bir şey yakışır mı?
Bey olmak, ahalinin canına kast edeni yok etmeyi gerektirir…
english: Being a lord requires eliminating those who threaten the lives of the people … not handing them over
Tuğtekin, a decision was made at the meeting. We have no choice

text: Gayrı buna uymaktan başka çaremiz yoktur.
Fırsatınız varken beni öldürün demiştim değil mi akıllı oğlan?
english: I told you to kill me while you have the chance, did n't I, smart boy?

text: …er ya da geç bunun hesabını senden soracaklar.
english: …will hold you accountable for this sooner or later .
Ha Sungur, what have we done? We ourselves set free the infidels who coveted our

text: Ekmeğimize, bacımıza, anamıza göz diken kefereyi…
english: bread, our sisters, and our mothers
I'm going to kill Noyan, brother. If I kill

text: …sulh zaafa düşer. Esir komutanlarımız da Moğolların elinde ölür.
english: …peace will be weakened. Our captured commanders also die at the hands of the Mongols.

text: O yüzden Köpek, esir komutanlarımızı alıp getirdikten sonra...
english: Therefore, after Dog brings back our captured commanders ...
n't allow that, brother. I can't send

text: Seni Noyan’ın peşine tek başına salamam.
english: you alone after Noyan . I have to

text: Noyan yaşarsa, neler olacağını sen de çok iyi bilirsin.
english: Noyan lives, you know very well what will happen. Then

text: O vakit ben de seninle geleceğim kardeşim.
english: I will come with you, brother.

text: Bu öyle bir yoldur ki ağabey…
…ne vakit dönerim, döner miyim, dönmez miyim belli değildir.
english: ...where it's uncertain when I'll return, or if I'll return at all.

text: Sen iki obanın da Alplerinin başısın. Yokluğunda oba zaafa düşer.
english: You are the leader of the Alps of both tribes. The tribe is weakened in his absence.
You can't come, brother. And what about my

text: …niye gittiğimi de bilecek kadar akıllı bir kadındır.
english: is a woman intelligent enough to know why I'm leaving, just as she knows why I came.
don't withhold your prayers from me, brother.
(Rabarba) We want justice. Let's kill him!
Give Rabarba his punishment. Kill him!
Son, the tribe is now in your care.

text: Yüce rabbim, bilirim bana bir evlat daha nasip ettin.
english: My Lord, I know you have blessed me with another child. May
God grant me the strength to raise him… to

text: …doğurup, Gündoğdu Bey’ime yaraşır bir evlat yetiştirmemi nasip eyle.
english: give birth to him and to raise a child worthy of my dear Gündoğdu Bey.
The night Gündoğdu Bey stayed here…
…I had a feeling I was pregnant.

text: Bundan gayrı sadece kendim için değil…
english: From now on, I will fight not only for myself…
…but also for my child . So that the
hope blossoming within me can flourish.

text: Gayrı evlatlarım hiç olmadığı kadar tehdit altında.
english: Now my children are under more threat than ever before. We have to find

text: Buna bir hâl çaresini düşünmek mecburiyetindeyiz.

english: Call him. I'd like to talk to you.
Where is Sungur, son? Mom's gone
How could you let her go?
How are they going to kill Noyan after chasing after the huge Mongol army?

text: Nasıl böyle bir şeye izin verdin Gündoğdu?
english: How could you allow something like this, Gündoğdu?
Noyan will spare neither you nor me

text: …ne Halime’yi, ne karnındaki bebesini sağ koymaz. Bilirsin.
english: … neither Halime nor the baby in her womb . You know.
Sungur knew all this, yet he did everything he could to get

text: …sulh için onu salıverelim diye elinden geleni yaptı.
english: him released for the sake of peace .
He did it for our country, for our Alps. The mother had decided to

text: En başından beri onu öldürmeyi kafasına koymuştu ana.
english: kill him from the very beginning .

text: Bu sebepten gitmesi için elinden geleni yaptı.
english: That's why he did everything he could to make her leave.

text: Yarabbi, bu çınar dallarıyla tüm cihanı kucaklasın.
english: O Lord, may this plane tree embrace the whole world with its branches.
Let it put down roots in the soil. May

text: …neslimiz senin yolunda adaletini ve merhametini tüm cihana yaysın.
english: our descendants spread your justice and mercy throughout the world, following in your footsteps.

text: Bu uğurda, bu çınarın kaderi bizim de kaderimiz olsun.
english: In this endeavor, let the fate of this plane tree be our fate as well.
the sun our flag, and the sky our tent .
We will drive our horses across the vast plains.

text: Pusatlarımızı yâr eyleyip, ordularımızı gür kılacağız.
english: We will make our weapons our allies, and our armies mighty.

text: Tamgamız, yedi iklimde adaletin sancağı olarak dalgalanacak.
english: Our emblem will wave as a banner of justice across the seven climates.

text: İlahi muştumuzu dağların, denizlerin ötesine taşıyacağız.
english: We will carry our divine message beyond mountains and seas.
